short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This stops all the annoying notices on the d20 pathfinder srd site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you hate the stupid ad that pops up on the pathfinder srd? Me too. Click "Got it" err, install this extension to get rid of it automatically.
